channel.title: Developing on DNS Proxy Server
channel.description: Recent content in Developing on DNS Proxy Server

item.title: Compiling from source
item.description: Requirements See the requirements. Building from Source Build the frontend files (optional) ./builder.bash build-frontend Build and run the program Jar file $ ./gradlew clean build compTest shadowJar -i $ java -jar dns-proxy-server-*-all.jar Native Image $ ./gradlew clean build compTest shadowJar nativeCompile $ ./build/native/nativeCompile/dns-proxy-server

item.title: Generating the docs
item.description: Requirements Hugo 0.55.4 Live Docs Preview Vanilla $ hugo server --source docs Docker $ docker-compose -f docker-compose-dev.yml up docs Generating Doc Statics DPS uses Hugo to generate static docs. To generate the HTML use the following $ ./builder.bash docs

item.title: Release Process
item.description: Feature Request - Phase 1 Create a pull request CI will be checked automatically Once CI is passing, the author @mageddo must approve the PR Merge the PR Pre-Releasing New Version - Phase 2 Define the new version number Document the new version and changes at RELEASE-NOTES.md Generate the git tag with the steps below Patch Version $ ./gradlew release Major Version $ VERSION=3.18.0 && .
